ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: I usually buy the metal sheets since it is cheaper than making them. I think you need two small bricks and the cost of the sheet at the merchant is slightly
ygData.messageBody:
I usually buy the metal sheets since it is cheaper than making them. I think
you need two small bricks and the cost of the sheet at the merchant is
slightly cheaper than the cost of two bricks.

Chingho
-----Original Message-----
From: McConnell, Jeff <Jeff.McConnell@...>
To: 'EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com' <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 7:41 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Studs and Bonding


>From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
>Thank you. You wouldn't happen to know the formula for making metal sheets,
>not the folded sheets but the ones used to make banded. I know it was
broken
>but I have seen on a few boards that its now working.
>Silver
>
